place.name: BRADWELL
place.gazetteerText: BRADWELL, a parish in-Mutford district, Suffolk; on the East Suffolk railway, near Belton station, 3 miles SW by S of Great Yarmouth. Post Town, Yarmouth. Acres, 2,383. Real property, £4,482. Pop., 387. Houses, 80. The property is subdivided. The living is a rectory in the diocese of Norwich. Value, £632.* Patron, J. Walker, Esq. The church has a curious ancient font; and is good. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
